metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28589 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: An improper array index validation vulnerability exists in the LoadObjfunctionality of tinyobjloader v2.0-rc1 and tinyobjloader developmentcommit 79d4421. A specially crafted file could lead to code execution. Anattacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: tinyobjloader package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
